Text.content:
The Blog Article is a full featured article element. It can contain several paragraphs and images, as well as information about author, publihing date etc. Compared to the much simpler Content Section, a Blog Article forms a semantic entity.  

The full content of a Blog Article is usually displayed on a Detail page. On this page, teaser elements are created using the Blog Article Teaser formatter.
